name: Rewind - Brackeys Jam 2023.1
description:
Rewind is a platformer that plays backwards! from th game over screenn to the start of the game, mak sure to jump when you land and avoid unwanted timelines. Don't worry if you mess up, you can always fastforward back to safety!

I made this game in a couple hours while being sick at home, so expect bugs and low quality graphics, but not music...

Nevertheless, It's been a while since I made a gam and it's been fun to get back into it. I hope you enjoy it :)
